Jordan Pass 01 day visit to Petra ??
Visitor center – Treasury/ Two ways (8 KM)25 JD

Petra Theater – Abo Oleg (1.4 KM)15 JD

Qaser Albint – Abo Oleg (400 M)5 JD
Qaser Albint – Abo Oleg/ Two ways (800 M)10 JD
For the accommodated visitors who visit Petra on the first day of their arrival from the borders they will pay the border ticket fees(90JD) and return the next day to get a refund of 40 JD.
Please submit your valid passport to the ticket office.
Tickets are available by cash or Credit cards .
Children under 12 years old are free of charge.
Visit is consecutive for those who hold a two/ three days entry ticket.
The residents fee is 10 JD as long as the resident is holding a valid residence card issued for at least one year.
Jordan pass ticket doesn’t include the Night show "Petra by Night".
Jordan pass ticket holders should submit their ticket in the ticket office so they can do the back road route.
Daylight ticket is required to attend the Petra by night show.
Club cars are available upon your arrival, no need to book in advance.
You can make an appointment for return.
The club car could carry up to 5 people one time.
Cash basis only/ US Dollar and Jordan Diner are accepted.
Children under 3 years old are free of charge.

Drop off by 4x4 cars from little Petra to the beginning of the Monastery trail costs 5 JOD per person/ one way, this service is available for back and forth, every day  starting from 07:30 till 14:30 .
Club cars are available everyday from 07:00 till 17:00
